Killing

The Judge can judge a certain player during the Meeting.

If the Target is evil, the Target will be killed. If the Judge is wrong and the Target isnâ€™t evil, the Judge will Suicide.

The judging command is /tl [player ID].

You can see the ID of playerâ€™s next to their name, or by typing /id

PS: You donâ€™t need to worry about this if you have a TOHE Modded Client, as it includes a built-in Trial Button on Player Nameplates.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Judges that can be in a match
  • Max Trials per Meeting
    • Set how many times a Judge can Trial players per Meeting
- Options
  • Madmates
    • : this Add-On can be Trialed by the Judge
    • : the Judge will suicide if they try to trial
  • Charmed
    • : this Add-On can be Trialed by the Judge
    • : the Judge will suicide if they try to Trial this role
  • Sidekicks
    • : this Add-On can be Trialed by the Judge
    • : the Judge will suicide if they try to Trial this Add-On
  • Infected
    • : this Add-On can be Trialed by the Judge
    • : the Judge will suicide if they try to Trial this Add-On
  • Contagious
    • : this Add-On can be Trialed by the Judge
    • : the Judge will suicide if they try to Trial this Add-On
  • Killing
    • : this Role-Type can be Trialed by the Judge
    • : the Judge will suicide if they try to Trial this Role type
  • Benign
    • : this Role-Type can be Trialed by the Judge
    • : the Judge will suicide if they try to Trial this Role type
  • Evil
    • : this Role-Type can be Trialed by the Judge
    • : the Judge will suicide if they try to Trial this Role type
  • Chaos
    • : this Role-Type can be Trialed by the Judge
    • : the Judge will suicide if they try to Trial this Role type
  • Killing
    • : this Role-Type can be Trialed by the Judge
    • : the Judge will suicide if they try to Trial this Role type
  • Hide Judgeâ€™s commands
    • : the mod will attempt to hide the Judgeâ€™s /tl commands
    • : the mod will not care to hide the Judgeâ€™s commands.
